question: Women and Child Development Ministry has classified all its programmes under how many umbrella schemes?
explanation:
The Union Women and Child Development Ministry has classified all its major programmes under three umbrella schemes, for their better implementation.
Mission Poshan 2.0, Mission Vatsalya and Mission Shakti are the umbrella schemes. While Mission Shakti will consist of schemes for protection of women, Mission Vatsalya will include childcare schemes.
